title: The Society Party
description: Laverne DeFazio and Shirley Feeney mingle at a dinner party that's being given by their boss's family.

title: The Bachelor Party
description: Laverne allows a bachelor party to be thrown in the pizzeria.

title: Bowling for Razzberries
description: It's the Bowling Championship, for the Shotz ladies bowling team. Laverne, comes down with a bad cold, on the night of the game.

title: A Nun's Story
description: The girls are looking forward to their once a year High School reunion. They also are looking forward to seeing their old friend Anne Marie. Much to their horror, Anne Marie is a Catholic nun.

title: Falter at the Alter
description: Laverne decides to marry her boyfriend - even though she's been going out with him for two months.

title: Dog Day Blind Dates
description: The girls go on a disastrous double-blind date.

title: Once Upon a Rumor
description: Lenny starts a rumor that Squiggy and Shirley are a couple, but Squiggy was just fixing Shirley's zipper.

title: One Flew Over Milwaukee
description: Shirley drives everyone crazy with her nurturing of her pet canary.

title: Dating Slump
description: Shirley is left dateless due to her dating standards.

title: It's the Water
description: Laverne gets jealous of Shirley's promotion at the brewery.

title: Fakeout at the Stakeout
description: Laverne becomes a decoy to help catch a thief.

title: Hi, Neighbor
description: Squiggy and Lenny move into the girls' building, making them all neighbors.

title: How Do You Say 'Are You Dead' in German?
From Suds to Stardom
description: The girls have been out of the company's annual talent competition for the past four years, but this year, they're determined to be part of the show.

title: Mother Knows Worst
description: Shirley's mother comes to visit.

title: Drive! She Said
description: Shirley wants to buy a car but needs half of Laverne's money to afford it. Laverne refuses to help buy the car and Shirley reveals Laverne's secret fear: she's scared to drive.

title: Angels of Mercy
description: Shirley talks Laverne into volunteering with her at the hospital.

title: Bachelor Mothers
description: It's Saturday night and the girls have no dates. Fonzie drops by and asks the girls to babysit his god son and they do. But when someone asks them out, they play odds and even to see who stays with the baby and Shirley who usually wins loses. After Shirley leaves the guy who ask them out calls to say they can't make it. So Shirley asks Lenny and Squiggy to go catch her but they refuse. Shirley goes and asks them to watch the baby. When they come back they find the baby gone, the guys say someone came saying he's the father and took the baby. The girls are worried when the mother shows up.

title: Excuse Me, May I Cut In?
description: The girls get Richie and Potsie as partners for a dance contest.

title: The Bridal Shower
description: The girls have trouble fitting in at a bridal shower.

title: Look Before You Leap
description: Laverne tries to remember the events of a wild night when she wakes up with morning sickness and fears she may be pregnant.

title: Dear Future Model
description: The girls decide to start a new career in modeling.

title: Good Time Girls
description: The girls end up getting phone calls after Hector scribbles their number in a men's room.

title: Two of Our Weirdos Are Missing
description: Lenny and Squiggy vanish without a trace.

title: Oh Hear the Angels' Voices
description: Carmine talks the girls into singing at a Christmas show.

title: Guilty Until Proven Not Innocent
description: Laverne gets arrested for stealing.

title: Anniversary Show
description: The girls remember experiences from the past year.

title: Playing Hooky
description: Laverne and Shirley call in sick to take a day off of work and have fun; they go on a bike ride, go to the park and meet two men who they have a great time with, until they're arrested for solicitation.

title: Guinea Pigs
description: In order to raise the money to go to a cocktail party, the girls sign up to be paid volunteers for scientific experiments.

title: Call Me a Taxi
description: A temporary lay off at work forces the girls to take jobs as taxi dancers. They earn money by dancing with men for ten cents a dance.

title: Steppin' Out
description: As the girls rush to get ready for a big date, they face wardrobe and hair problems, as well as complications from a house fire raging across the street.

title: Buddy Can You Spare a Father?
description: Shirley goes looking for her missing down-and-out father at a sleazy bar on the waterfront.

title: Honeymoon Hotel
description: Shirley wins a honeymoon vacation in a fancy hotel and she and Laverne decide to take advantage of it. Carmine poses as Shirley's husband and they sneak Laverne in, but after Carmine leaves, the girls quickly find out the hotel is intent on getting as many publicity photos of the married couple as possible throughout the vacation.

title: Hi Neighbor, Book 2
description: When Lenny and Squiggy get stood up, Laverne and Shirley take pity on them.

title: Frank's Fling
description: The girls conspire to ruin Frank's girlfriend.

title: Haunted House
description: Laverne and Shirley want to buy a new couch and find out about a furniture sale in a house Shirley says is haunted. When they and Lenny and Squiggy go to buy the couch they find out she may be right.

title: Lonely at the Middle
description: Shirley gets promoted to head of the bottle-labelers division at the brewery.

title: Citizen Krane
description: The girls are headlined in a musical extravaganza by an impresario who promises them fame and fortune.

title: Airport '59
description: The girls are happy to head out on their first plane trip ever but their smiles are turned upside down when their pilot passes out. Leaving it up to to one of them to take over the controls.

title: Laverne & Shirley Meet Fabian
description: Rosie Greenbaum bets Laverne & Shirley they can't get into the hotel where singer Fabian is staying. As well as getting their picture taken with him. What plan of action will the girls "turn loose" to meet him and put Rosie in her place?

title: The Slow Child
description: Laverne and Shirley get reacquainted with Miss Babish's mentally challenged daughter, Amy, who's visiting from her special school. Lenny meets Amy and immediately comes to like her, despite people's protests about what's best for Amy.

title: The Second Almost Annual Shotz Talent Show
The Driving Test
description: Laverne and Shirley try to help Squiggy study to ace his written exam for his driving test or else he'll lose his job as a Shotz truck driver.

title: The Obstacle Course
description: Laverne's cop boyfriend is running an obstacle course for the Ladies Auxiliary Michigan Police program and Shirley signs up to try it despite a history of poor athletics.

title: The Debutante Ball
description: Laverne attends a Debutante Ball with Lenny when it's found out he's 89th in line to be a duke on the Polish throne.

title: Breaking Up and Making Up: Edna & Frank
Festival: Part 1
description: Laverne, Shirley, Frank and Edna travel to New York to visit Frank's mother and attend a street festival; they are joined there by Lenny and Squiggy (who hitchhiked).

title: Festival: Part 2
description: Laverne, Shirley, Frank, Edna, Lenny, and Squiggy continue their visit to New York, and Frank wants to win a trip to Italy for his mother by winning the Greased Pole competition.

title: Laverne & Shirley Go to Night School
Dinner for Four
description: The girls think they've hit the dating jackpot when they get asked to cook dinner for 2 good looking men. However they're in for 2 big surprises at the men's apartment.

title: The Third Annual Shotz Talent Show
There's a Spy in My Beer
Shotgun Wedding: Part 2
description: 09/13/79 : After Pt. 1 on Happy Days aired that night as the conclusion to the tale of Fonzie & Richie's attempt to back out of marrying the farmer's daughters. Laverne & Shirley to the rescue.

title: What Do You Do with a Drunken Sailor?
We're in the Army, Now: Part 1
We're in the Army, Now: Part 2
The Fourth Annual Shotz Talent Show
Not Quite South of the Border
You Oughta Be in Pictures
description: With a movie about to be filmed in Milwaukee, the excited girls try out for parts and land the leading roles. Of course, they are not so thrilled when they get the real scoop on the film and their parts.

title: Why Did the Fireman...
description: Laverne is in deep denial when she learns that her boyfriend, a firefighter with the Milwaukee Fire Department, is killed fighting an apartment blaze.

title: Murder on the Moose Jaw Express: Part 1
description: While on a train heading to Canada,the girls end up in the middle of espionage & murder,after an injured man comes to them,warning,"Beware of the bald man" and expiring. Who is the bald man and will the girls escape certain danger?

title: Murder on the Moose Jaw Express: Part 2
description: Pt. 2 - Laverne sees Shirley is missing,Lenny & Squiggy attempt a rescue and no bald man on the train is above suspicion. Laverne realizes she needs to out the villain & confront him. Will the Laverne,Shirley,Lenny and Suiggy survive?

title: Separate Tables
description: To help Laverne fight a phobia of doing things alone,Shirley comes up with the idea of Laverne dining alone for a full evening in a Chinese Restaurant. Hopefully the owner & the entertainment will help her forget her solitude.

title: Not Quite New York
description: The girls have worked for Shotz 8 years. Now,they & all others in the bottle cap dept. are cut loose. They've been replaced by a machine. With nothing to lose,the girls decide to join Frank & Edna in Burbank,CA and say goodbye to Miluakee.

title: Welcome to Burbank
description: Lenny & Squiggy drive the girls to Burbank in an old ice cream truck. The girls enter and set up their new apt. Soon,they meet their new neighbors and are quickly shook up at California ways. Will they adapt or head on back?

title: Studio City
description: The girls find out about auditions for a new Troy Donahue film. Upon arrival it turns out the studio's seeking stunt women. The girls go for it,only to discover Troy's not in their scene. Is there still hope to meet their movie idol?

title: Grand Opening
description: Shirley's working,Laverne isn't and Shirley's paying all the bills. Also,Cowboy Bill's is opening and Sonny & LaVerne were to do a stunt. He gets hurt,so it's Shirley who ends up throwing knives at Laverne. Is she really "this" mad at her?

title: Candy Is Dandy
description: The girls land a full time job working in Bardwell's dept. store, gift wrapping. 1st task? Wrap boxes of candy. Laverne eats some, unaware they contain Rum. She ends up out of it & Shirley's in a panic. Will their new boss give them the toss?

title: The Dating Game
description: The girls fail to get on The Dating Game but Lenny & Squiggy(somehow)get chosen by host Jim Lange. The boys turn the show upside down with their crazy antics and answers. Can they still rate winning a date?

title: The Other Woman
description: Shirley dates a Dr. estranged from his wife. While watching his son at Cowboy Bill's,Laverne meets her. She's almost Shirley's twin. Shirley meets her later and now sees herself as a substitute. Which lady's heart will break in the end?

title: The Road to Burbank
description: A hotel in Nevada is suing for room damages caused by Laverne & Shirley and the boys,while en route to California. Both say it's the others' fault and both tell different versions of what went down. Who's truly guilty here?

title: Born Too Late
description: Lenny & Squiggy attend a silent movie show. They like how the guy gets the girl. Failing to do so at Frank's restaurant. They discuss how the "leading man" could be used to their advantage. Shown in "silent films" starring them.

title: Love Out the Window
description: Laverne loves stuntman Sonny but fears losing him,if a stunt fails. Shirley tells Sonny. He quits to sell insurance,giving Laverne less to worry about. Seeing later,that he's now unhappy,Laverne plots to get him back where he belongs.

title: Malibu Mansion
description: Cowboy Bill (who gave Frank his franchise) hires the girls to house sit his seaside Malibu home. After he leaves,Laverne gets the not so bright idea to throw a beach party, inviting all - and inviting a storm of trouble.

title: To Tell the Truth
description: On a rainy night,Rhonda brings over a game called "Truth" for the girls and their friends to play. Players must reply honestly but the sharp arrows of truth trigger a night of verbal fights between all.

title: I Do, I Do
description: The girls meet 2 British band mates,who take them to a Hollywood party. In attempt avoid drug use going on,they eat "brownies" instead. The end result causes them to agree to marry the two,who'll pay less taxes by having wives.

title: But Seriously, Folks
description: Carmine decides to take a shot at stand up comedy but when his act almost fails,he decides to make jokes at his friends expense. Ultimately making them feel humiliated. Will Carmine cut it out carry on carelessly?

title: The Bardwell Caper: Part 1
description: Passed over for a raise,Shirley pens a note to the boss. Laverne signs,adding an insult & it gets sent. Later,he informs them they did get it. Now the girls must execute "Mission:Impossible" to retrieve the nasty note. Make no mistake.

title: The Bardwell Caper: Part 2
description: In part two,with help from Carmine & the boys...the girls put their 'perfect' plan into action. Things quickly unfold into clock-like confusion. Will they nab the note & save their jobs before Mr. Bardwell's arrival?

title: High Priced Dates
description: Rhonda gets the girls a date with 2 big spenders. Later the 2 men try to 'cash in' and make a play for them. The girls stop them cold but wonder later if they over-reacted. Do they owe the guys more because they spent so much?

title: Fifth Anniversary
description: Edna & all think Frank has forgotten his 5th wedding anniversary,making Edna furious. The girls & the guys play peacemaker for the two and have an anniversary party in the couple's unstable trailer home.

title: Out, Out Damn Plout
description: Sgt. Alvinia Plout has gone AWOL. A General she loved,broke her heart. She hides at the girl's place & takes a job as a lounge singer. All while M.P.'s trail her. The girls must think fast to save their former Sarge from a court-martial.

title: Laverne's Broken Leg
description: Laverne,after breaking her leg,feels like a burden to others. She also feels self pity. Wishing out-loud she was never born,a guardian angel appears,showing her what friends & her father would be like if she hadn't existed.

title: Sing, Sing, Sing
description: Carmine & Shirley perform a beautiful duet at Cowboy Bill's. Laverne too,wants to sing as pretty a song as they did. Carmine gives her voice lessons and Lenny also tries to help. ...but it just may be Squiggy has the real answer for her.

title: Child's Play
description: Shirley's new play is a wild take,on Mother Goose. Her friends in lead roles. Enter a Broadway Impresario wanting a preview. Giving Lenny & Squiggy an address to the theatre,they promptly lose it. Is it onto Broadway? Or off the deep end?

title: It Only Hurts When I Breathe
I Wonder What Became of Sal?
Moving In
description: Laverne says yes to her boyfriend about living together & Shirley must keep Frank from finding out. Later,Laverne starts to doubt the arrangement. Is it together forever in love or just for fun?

title: Whatever Happened to the Class of '56?
description: The girls & Carmine fly to Miluakee for a Class Of '56 reunion. Only to find out that Lenny & Squiggy wrote a letter. The girls are hot new movie stars and Carmine's a Vegas sensation. Will they fess up to their peers or keep it a secret?

title: That's Entertainment
description: Frank & Carmine have an all out debate about whose generation's music and movies are better. The comparisons are shown in entertaining performances by the cast members.

title: The Playboy Show
description: When Rhonda asks her to pick up a job application at the local Playboy Bunny Club, it's Laverne who gets the job offer, who defies her father's wishes and accepts the job, anyway.

title: The Monastery Show
description: Needing a much needed retreat, Laverne goes to a convent for a retreat but she can not get used to the nuns vow of silence.

title: The Ghost Story
description: When the ghost of a former Olympian haunts her apt. ,Laverne and friends hold the craziest séance ever to make contact. Actually getting rid of the ghost proves to a race to the finish.

title: Do the Carmine
description: Attempting to become a singer, Carmine writes & records a very catchy dance song that catches fire but the lyrics burn the ears of 1960s, almost militant, censorship.

title: Councilman DeFazio
description: Frank decides to run for a city councilman's position,when his restaurant ,Cowboy Bill's,is threatened to be closed up & torn down to make way for a high rise. Can Frank foil this foul political plot?

title: Here Today, Hair Tomorrow
description: Carmine's fed up with L.A. and his lack of success there as an entertainer and decided to go to New York,with financial help from friends and try out for a role in the musical "Hair".
